name: Joyfill iOS Development Agents
description: Specialized subagents for Joyfill iOS SDK development

swiftui.name: SwiftUI Components Agent
swiftui.description: Creates and modifies SwiftUI views, handles @State/@Binding, implements field components. Use for UI work.

formula.name: Formula Engine Agent
formula.description: Works on formula parsing, evaluation, and function implementations. Use for formula-related tasks.

viewmodel.name: ViewModel Logic Agent
viewmodel.description: Handles DocumentEditor, handlers (Validation, Formula, ConditionalLogic), and state management.

tests.name: Unit Test Agent
tests.description: Writes and runs XCTest unit tests following project conventions. Use after implementing features.

models.name: Data Model Agent
models.description: Works on Codable structs, JoyDoc structure, and ValueUnion types. Use for data modeling.

build.name: Build & CI Agent
build.description: Runs builds, tests, handles SPM, and CI/CD workflows. Use for build and CI tasks.

review.name: Code Review Agent
review.description: Reviews Swift code for quality, performance, memory leaks, and conventions. Read-only analysis.

docs.name: Documentation Agent
docs.description: Writes Swift doc comments and updates markdown documentation.
